name: RGB (z00l)
description:
RGB is a first-person Puzzle Platformer where you switch between each of the three primary colors to progress. Deducing how each color interacts is the key to victory.

Solve puzzles and explore this neon world!

Created in Florida Poly Fall 2020 Game Jam.

https://www.twitch.tv/fpmclub


Credits:
